thread.title: John McCain's mom celebrates 105th birthday
thread.title_full: John McCain's mom celebrates 105th birthday | Washington Examiner

author: Caitlin Yilek
title: John McCain's mom celebrates 105th birthday
text:
Republican Sen. John McCain wished his "wonderful" mother, Roberta, a happy 105th birthday Tuesday with a montage of photos on Twitter.
"We love you mom!" the Arizona senator tweeted.
Happy 105th birthday to my wonderful mother Roberta - we love you mom! pic.twitter.com/63E912Imub — John McCain (@SenJohnMcCain) February 7, 2017 
McCain's wife, Cindy, and daughter, Meghan, also tweeted birthday wishes.

Sorry, there was a problem processing your email signup. Please try again later. Processing... Thank you for signing up for Washington Examiner News Alerts. You should receive your first alert soon! "You are an inspiration to me and so many others every day," Meghan McCain wrote.
Happy 105th Birthday to my incredible Nana (Roberta) McCain! You are an inspiration to me and so many others every day. pic.twitter.com/lzHKx8MKmo — Meghan McCain (@MeghanMcCain) February 7, 2017 
Happy 105th Birthday Roberta McCain! https://t.co/lJ6rxxoDxX — Cindy McCain (@cindymccain) February 7, 2017 
Roberta McCain was born Feb. 12, 1912, in Oklahoma.
